name: Stranded (itch) (Yeray101)
description:
STORY

What would happen if you were abandoned to your own luck in Space? Will you have what it takes to return home alive?

Stranded is a VR game created for the VR Jam 2022 in which you wake up alone in an abandoned space station. Make sure that you ration your O2 reserves. all canisters are one-time use and using your air reserves is the only way you can move through the station, but being left adrift without oxygen will be your doom.

CONTROLS

Oculus Touch:
- Thrusters: R/L Triggers
- Dodge: A/X buttons
- Grab: R/L grab button
- Emergency breaks: B/Y
- Quit game: Press pause button for 2 seconds

Steam controllers:
- Thrusters: R/L Triggers
- Dodge: R/L A buttons
- Grab: R/L grip buttons
- Emergency breaks B/Y button
- Quit game: Press pause button for 2 seconds

PC REQUIREMENTS

The game has been tested on multiple headsets, including Oculus Quest 2, HTC Vive and Valve Index. PC performance may vary, but it has been tested in 4 PCs ranging from midrange to high end.

TEAM

AshishB  (Twitter @Ashishsb87): 3D Artist/Modeler

Gene Chaban (Twitter @sound_digitator): Sound designer/Composer

Lamar "Tony" Daughma (Twitter @lite5h4dow): Programmer/Modeler

Yeray Carvajal Silva (Twitter @Yeray_CS): Game/Level/Technical Designer

KNOWN BUGS

- Voice lines not triggering correctly.
- Thruster haptics may not work correctly on Oculus Touch.
